title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 27, 2020
description: On this day in 1978, the country of Spain became a democracy after 40 years of fascist dictatorship. Headlines that day read, “Good morning, democracy.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1978, the country of Spain became a democracy after 40 years of fascist dictatorship. Headlines that day read, “Good morning, democracy.”
